info.title: MusicApp API
info.description: Documentation de l'API MusicApp (auth, artistes, albums, chansons.)

get.description: Retrieve a list of all artists

post.description: Store a newly created artist in the database

get.description: Retrieve the details of a specific artist by ID

put.description: Update the details of an existing artist by ID

delete.description: Delete an existing artist by ID

get.summary: Get all artists with their albums
get.description: Retrieve a list of all artists along with their associated albums

get.summary: Get a specific artist with their albums and chansons
get.description: Retrieve the details of a specific artist along with all their albums and the songs in each album
Retrieve a list of all albums with their artist
Retrieve details of a specific album by ID

put.description: Update the details of an existing album by ID

delete.description: Delete an existing album by ID

post.description: Authenticate a user and return an API token.
Revoke all API tokens for the authenticated user and logout.
Inscription d'un nouvel utilisateur dans l'application MusicApp.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all songs
Retrieve details of a specific song by ID

get.summary: Get all chansons of a specific album
get.description: Retrieve all songs that belong to a specific album

200.description: List of chansons for the album

get.summary: Search chansons by title or artist name
get.description: Search for songs either by their title or by the artist's name. Returns a list of matching songs with album and artist info.

parameters.name: titre
parameters.description: Song title or artist name to search for

400.description: Titre or artist name not provided

message.example: Veuillez fournir un titre ou nom d'artiste
